events.name: Expanding system boundaries and considering additional parameters in future studies
events.wd_label: Expanding system boundaries and considering additional parameters in future studies
events.wd_description: Future studies should expand system boundaries to include additional sources of material that must be recycled, such as the use phase or battery production. They should also consider more parameters, including current and prospective battery mixes, different recycling routes, and varying scales of recycling facilities.
events.description: Future studies should expand system boundaries to include additional sources of material that must be recycled, such as the use phase or battery production. They should also consider more parameters, including current and prospective battery mixes, different recycling routes, and varying scales of recycling facilities.

events.name: System boundaries
events.wd_description: Future studies should expand system boundaries to include the use phase and battery production as sources for materials to be recycled.
events.description: Future studies should expand system boundaries to include the use phase and battery production as sources for materials to be recycled.

events.name: Additional parameters
events.wd_description: Future studies should consider additional parameters within the study.
events.description: Future studies should consider additional parameters within the study.

events.name: Battery mixes
events.wd_description: Current and prospective battery mixes should be considered in future studies.
events.description: Current and prospective battery mixes should be considered in future studies.

events.name: Recycling routes
events.wd_description: Different recycling routes, such as pyrometallurgical routes and their combinations, should be considered as different companies use different recycling methods.
events.description: Different recycling routes, such as pyrometallurgical routes and their combinations, should be considered as different companies use different recycling methods.

events.name: Recycling facility scale
events.wd_description: The scale of the recycling facilities should be varied to provide good recommendations for the size at specific locations based on the spatial concentration of waste batteries.
events.description: The scale of the recycling facilities should be varied to provide good recommendations for the size at specific locations based on the spatial concentration of waste batteries.

events.name: Use phase inclusion
events.description: Future studies should expand system boundaries to include the use phase as a source for material that must be recycled.

events.name: Battery production inclusion
events.description: Battery production should also be considered within the expanded system boundaries to derive comprehensive recommendations

events.name: Pyrometallurgical recycling route
events.description: More recycling routes, such as the pyrometallurgical route, should be considered, as different companies use different recycling methods

events.name: Combination of recycling routes
events.description: Combinations of various recycling routes should be evaluated to provide more comprehensive recommendations.

events.name: Spatial concentration of waste batteries
events.description: The scale of recycling facilities should be varied to recommend the optimal size based on the spatial concentration of waste batteries.
